title: Shimmering Gold Vanki Bangles - A Touch of Modern Elegance
materials: Brilliant Cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Featuring a delicate Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster.
features: Modern interpretation of the classic Vanki design. The bangles showcase a sinuous, wave-like structure adorned with pavé-set CZ stones for maximum brilliance. Unique open-shank design for comfortable wear.
occasions: and contemporary gatherings. Ideal for adding a touch of sophisticated sparkle to any outfit.
description: These Vanki bangles offer a modern take on traditional South Indian jewelry. The brilliant-cut CZ stones provide a dazzling sparkle, while the high-purity gold ensures lasting value and beauty. Expert craftsmanship from Hyderabad, known for its refined jewelry-making techniques. Lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear. A timeless piece to treasure.
